document.full_text: cit group inc , the business lender run by former merrill lynch chief executive john thain, said first-quarter profit fell 55 percent, hurt by charges linked to buying back debt.
document.title: cit group q1 profit falls 55 percent
lines_and_colors: cit group inc , the business lender run by former merrill lynch chief executive john thain, said first-quarter profit fell 55 percent, hurt by charges linked to buying back debt.
